Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: ENAMELLED; ENGRAVED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; INCISED
Name: Amulets
Description: - An udjat-eye traditionally fashioned in light blue enamel. Both surfaces are ingraved with the eyebrow and the eye.- Two pendants in the shape of flowers whose petals and heart are ingraved in an opaque red-orange stone.
